__e: Someone once told me that time was a predator that stalked us all our lives, but I rather believe that time is a companion who goes with us on the journey, reminds us to cherish every moment because they'll never come again.
They thought it would be better... if a predator such as myself wasn't the first face that you see... when you walk into the ZPD.
So look, you're basically... a predator and I need some advice.
We're carnivorous motherfuckers, dawg, and you gotta carry it like that.
She's a dangerous predator, and we must stop her tonight.
